tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landmarks (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
   longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE landmarks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE points_of_interest (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE attractions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  location GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_point GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL,
  end_point GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE PointsOfInterest (
    poi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    start_location GEOGRAPHY,
    end_location GEOGRAPHY,
    distance DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    landmark_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (landmark_id) REFERENCES Landmarks(landmark_id)
);
